div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PractitionerRole|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `PractitionerRole.contact` has a context of PractitionerRole based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PractitionerRole`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 PractitionerRole to FHIR R4 PractitionerRole
